revised_title: Experimental Study of Olive Oil as a Treatment for Viper Bites
tldr: This article narrates experiments conducted on a man, a dog, and pigeons who were bitten by vipers. The subjects were treated with olive oil, which was found to be effective in alleviating symptoms and preventing further complications. The author suggests that olive oil could be a useful remedy for venomous bites, including those from rattlesnakes and other venomous animals.
